## Source: ossf-package-analysis (f0cb5162cb687b5124835fd30583748863748cca4c3c0b856c346b46c3499dce)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@nosinovacao/nosid-mfe-common' @ 9999.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
